title: Diddy Hit With Fresh 2025 Lawsuits – More Celebrities Named in Shocking Claims
shortdescription: Sean Combs faces wave of new accusers as trial looms – Hollywood braces for fallout.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: Just months before his May 2025 federal sex-trafficking trial, Sean 'Diddy' Combs has been hit with 25+ new civil lawsuits — including several that name high-profile celebrities allegedly present at his infamous 'freak-off' parties.

New filings describe drug-fueled nights, hidden cameras, and coercion. One plaintiff claims A-list attendees were recorded and later blackmailed. Names circulating in sealed documents reportedly include major actors and musicians.
Lawyers say this could be bigger than Epstein’s list. Several celebrities have already lawyered up and gone silent on social media.
